name: Lovers ' Smiles
description: A developing causal puzzle game for the whole family. Use physics, logic, imagination and ability to draw, to arrange a dream date for the two emoticons in love!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse
